text: One of my favorite places to enjoy pizza. Flavorful, staff is always great. Order is always right and taste fresh.

name: PamperedSteel
text: The whole family loves Hungry Howie's!  Great deals everyday means we can always get individual orders for the same or less cost than compromising on one big pizza anywhere else.  Great selection, great quality, and lots of ability to customize your order.  They even started offering gluten free pizza and subs!

name: Mike Peters
text: Stuffed crust very good. Great value & taste! Sell the wrong soft drink but other than that very good "pie"

name: Melissa Reimus
text: My boyfriend and I ordered a pizza there last night, and the man took our order and told us it'd be about an hour wait even after knowing our address. About two hours later we were still waiting with our door wide open at midnight for our ‚Ä¶More

name: Stephanie Revard
text: This is our go-to pizza place. Speedy service, great staff. They know us by name. I highly recommend this location!

name: UpNorth 4x4
text: Service was good but I've never had a pizza from this chain that I actually liked. It reminds me of any pizza you buy in the frozen section.

name: Praveen Devaiah
text: Thin XL pizza, wings were perfect. The wing sauce they use is mind-boggling. Highly recommended.!

text: Fast service. Friendly people.

name: James C.
text: Good pizza, great cinnamon bread, v fair prices. Est muy, muy bueno.

name: Steven Good
text: Great food, clean store, kind and courteous staff. Only downside is when ordering late at night, there are very few delivery drivers so it can be an uneasy wait for pizza. That being said, Management is very professional and know how to make sure you still get a fresh Hot pizza.

name: Mandy Hoard
text: This place is kinda odd to me. The pizza overall is nothing special. If you're not eating it as soon as it comes out of the oven, the cheese and things taste like store bought pizza as it cools. Nothing exceptional about that. HOWEVER, the ‚Ä¶More

name: Mariam Cappell
text: Quality was very poor...

name: Beth D
text: The young man was working ALONE and still managed to get my 7 large pizzas ready in a short amount of time. They were great, hot, and made well. I commend him and hope that he had some help throughout the rest of the day.  I will make sure we use this location for all work functions in the future.
